SELECT a.row_count AS rows FROM sys.dm_db_partition_stats a INNER JOIN sys.tables b ON b.object_id = a.object_id WHERE b.name='MK_Info_Navigationbar' ORDER BY row_count
UPDATE MK_Info_Navigationbar SET NavigationName = @NavigationName , Tips = @Tips WHERE ID = @ID
UPDATE MK_Info_Navigationbar SET ShowMark = @ShowMark WHERE ID = @ID
